Mark Moorehead
Retired Librarian and Church Musician
June 13, 2011, Mark worked with Blaine in the same group

In my seven years with Sirsi Corporation we often found ourselves in very difficult, technical, highly competitive situations.  Mark was instrumental to the company's success due to his incredible understanding both of our  customer's needs, and how to utilize our software offering to suit them.  The company grew at an impressive rate during those years, and much of the success was due to acquiring and keeping new customers.  Mark was key to our strategic growth and customer acquisition.  Without him many of the tight races we won would likely have gone to competitors.  He worked long hours, logged hundreds of thousands of miles, and provided our team with what we needed to succeed.  I give him my highest recommendation as a team member and would welcome him into any business situation as a valued consultant or participant.
